thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 3 of 2268
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
The samples are very true to the actual product which is great and you know what you are getting. The delivery was within the time stated and I was informed on the day of delivery which meant I could be at home to receive them.
They are very good quality and good value for money too. I would recommend to my friends and family and consider buying from them in the future
